name: Ampere Software Private Ltd.
tagline: Outsourced software prodct devt & testing services
description:
Ampere is a fast growing outsourced software product engineering company focused on helping software companies create innovative products for the next generation. Ampere's mission is to provide 24x7 engineering/support services with less cost and less time to the customers across the globe.
Key services: Commercial software development, software migration, software testing, software maintenance, legacy software support/migration, business support services such as data entry, data conversion etc.
